page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content:
The Guides,Brownies,Cubs and Scouts all meet at the Scout Hut near the Parish Hall between the Railway Station and the Roundabout(A537) { { Guides}meet on Mondays from 6.45-8.30. The two patrol leaders are Judith Britland and Linda Buxton.There is one helper and four patrols.The Neckerchief colour is red. { { Brownie}packs(4) meet on Mondays from 5.30-6.30pm.There are 2 pack Leaders called Mrs Preece and Mrs Povey and one helper called Mrs Gill.
The Guides and Brownies go on camp weekends and,sometimes, holidays to special campsites such as Barnswood, near Rushton Spencer, Leek.
